text: Isɨlaelɨ hɨdɨlɨ hulaŋ huaci huaci sɨbaŋ agɨladɨ igavɨla hulaŋ iamɨgali migɨla migɨla saŋ igahɨlavɨla lɨbɨmɨŋami. Lɨbɨmɨŋɨci manɨgali hɨhɨle hulaŋ iamɨgali 1,000 agɨladɨ hɨtɨŋ hɨtɨŋ migɨlavɨhadami. Manɨgali hɨhɨle hulaŋ iamɨgali 100 agɨladɨ hɨtɨŋ hɨtɨŋ migɨlavɨhadami. Manɨgali hɨhɨle hulaŋ iamɨgali 50 agɨladɨ hɨtɨŋ hɨtɨŋ migɨlavɨhadami. Manɨgali hɨhɨle hulaŋ iamɨgali 10 agɨladɨ hɨtɨŋ hɨtɨŋ migɨlavɨhadami.
